outline:
1. to be spacious, be open, be wide
    1. (Qal) to be spacious or open or wide
    2. (Hiphil) to make spacious, make open
  2. to be simple, entice, deceive, persuade
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be open-minded, be simple, be naive
      2. to be enticed, be deceived
    2. (Niphal) to be deceived, be gullible
    3. (Piel)
      1. to persuade, seduce
      2. to deceive
    4. (Pual)
      1. to be persuaded
      2. to be deceived
kjv_def: allure, deceive, enlarge, entice, flatter, persuade, silly (one).
strongs_def: to open, i.e. be (causatively, make) roomy; usually figuratively (in a mental or moral sense) to be (causatively, make) simple or (in a sinister way) delude
